R

Reference - Class in CrazyCopter.libs
Used to hold all necessary global attributes that classes may need to reference Moved away from a being a private member in a class to enhance ability to easily modify game
Reference() - Constructor for class CrazyCopter.libs.Reference
 
removeAllObjects() - Method in class CrazyCopter.Controller
Removes all objects from the game in order to start a new game
removeObject(CoreObject) - Static method in class CrazyCopter.Controller
Used to remove a specific object from the game
render(Graphics) - Method in class CrazyCopter.Controller
Used to render all objects in the game by looping through all objects and calling their render function
render(Graphics) - Method in class CrazyCopter.core.CoreObject
Render object to screen
render(Graphics) - Method in class CrazyCopter.entity.Block
 
render(Graphics) - Method in class CrazyCopter.entity.Enemy
 
render(Graphics) - Method in class CrazyCopter.entity.Player
 
render() - Method in class CrazyCopter.Game
Uses the GFX class to render all objects in the game Before rendering, it makes sure the Helicopter choice is correct so it displays the color helicopter associated with the player's profile
render(Graphics) - Method in class CrazyCopter.screens.Menu
Render Menu screen over Game screen
renderBackground(Graphics) - Method in class CrazyCopter.gfx.Renderer
Renders background of Game based on the Game's state
Renderer - Class in CrazyCopter.gfx
Used as a utility to render all objects in the screen Uses the Controller class, calls render() method in Controller
Renderer() - Constructor for class CrazyCopter.gfx.Renderer
 
renderForeground(Graphics) - Method in class CrazyCopter.gfx.Renderer
Renders objects in the Game based on the Game's state
reset() - Method in class CrazyCopter.Game
Resets game so it is ready to play again
RESOURCE_LOCATION - Static variable in class CrazyCopter.libs.Reference
Where do we store the images and resources the game will need to load Relative to where the application's executable file is stored
ResourceLoader - Class in CrazyCopter.utils
Used as a helper class to load all necessary resources for the game
ResourceLoader() - Constructor for class CrazyCopter.utils.ResourceLoader
 
resume() - Method in class CrazyCopter.Game
Resumes the game by changing the game state
run() - Method in class CrazyCopter.Game
When the game is ready (running == true) to be played this handles flow and logic of gameplay
